ComicInfo.Title: Black Pond
ComicInfo.Summary: Water and terror flow downstream to the banks of Black Pond and the spookiness of the town morgue. Charlie Finley, propietor of said establishment, is a good and decent man - until confronted with the limitless rage of a biological pathogen. It's one man's descent into terrible, horrible madness as the exclusive prequel to the Overture Films release THE CRAZIES continues. There is no everlasting peace to be found here - only bloodthirsty craziness. Also, bear witness as the true origin of the vicious pathogen continues to be revealed.
